name: Floating Factory
description:
Short Description

A game about building a fully automatic factory that make food for heavenly creatures in the most efficient way possible without forgetting to purging all the sin at night of course...

Survive at nightAt night creatures appear as a
result  of human actions. Collect the prayers and purge the sins.Take care of animalsAnimals are an essential part of your factory,they can make delicious foods in various ways.
You will need to control their
mating to manage their genetics, apply potions, collect their stool, and much more.Logistic

As the game progresses, more complex products appear, so you'll need to design an effective architecture for your factory to work.

Automation

If you don't want to spend time manually controlling the factory you better automate your entire factory, which you can in this game.
